name: GSI Nesting Red Wine Glass Set
description: Add a touch of class to your campsite toasts. These nesting wine glasses have wide bowls to allow the Bourdeaux to breathe before you take your first sip. Screw-off stems make them easy to fit into your pack for a little backwoods luxury.Set of 2 glasses.Bowls made of taste-free co-polyester.Durable material withstands chilled or mulled temperatures.Long stems keep your drink out of the duff.
